channel.title: News on Elise van der Pol
channel.description: Recent content in News on Elise van der Pol

item.title: Contribution: CS PhD narratives book
item.description: I was featured in the PhD narratives book Why would I want to do a PhD in computer science?.

item.title: Nomination for the WAI NL Researcher Award
item.description: I was nominated for the WAI NL Researcher Award.

item.title: PhD Defense
item.description: 12th July 2023 I successfully defended my PhD thesis entitled Symmetry and Structure in Deep Reinforcement Learning and obtained my PhD degree.

item.title: Organization: Symmetries in Robot Learning Workshop (@RSS 2023)
item.description: We organized a workshop on Symmetries in Robot Learning at RSS 2023

item.title: Organization: Physics for Machine Learning Workshop (@ICLR 2023)
item.description: We organized a workshop on Physics for Machine Learning at ICLR 2023.

item.title: WiML Profile
item.description: I was profiled by Women in Machine Learning.

item.title: Job: Microsoft Senior Researcher
item.description: I’ve joined Microsoft Research Amsterdam as a Senior Researcher. I’ll be working on reinforcement learning and deep learning for molecular simulation.

item.title: Organization: Gamification and Multi-Agent Solutions Workshop (@ICLR 2022)
item.description: We organized a workshop on gamification and multi-agent solutions at ICLR 2022.

item.title: Organization: Data-Centric Reinforcement Learning Workshop (@NeurIPS 2021)
item.description: We organized a workshop on data-centric reinforcement learning at NeurIPS 2021.

item.title: Job: DeepMind Internship
item.description: I was a research scientist intern in DeepMind’s Multi-Agent team.

item.title: Organization: Bad Hypothesis Contest Social (@ICLR 2021)
item.description: We organized an ICLR social which took place 6 May 2021.

item.title: Contribution: GNNs in RL
item.description: I was invited to contribute my thoughts on GNNs in RL to What does 2022 hold for Geometric and Graph ML? by Michael Bronstein and Petar Veliƒçkovi
